results.deck: Considered one of the best racing games of the 16-bit era, Super Monaco GP puts the player in the driver seat for a simulation of the 1989/90 F1 season. The game features both an arcade and 2-year championship modes.
results.description: The game was released in arcades in 1989 and for the Sega Mega Drive in 1990.
results.name: Super Monaco GP

game.name: Ayrton Senna's Super Monaco GP II
Formula One World Championship: Beyond the Limit
